about.title: About us
about.description1: ChipGlobe GmbH has been founded in the beginning of 2014 by Volker Frisch, one of the initiators and key executive members of frobas GmbH, whose team of experts had been active in global projects since 2003.ChipGlobe is an independent entity dedicated to help customers in developing comprehensive chips (ASICS, FPGAs and Embedded Systems (Firmware)) from idea and initial spec to prototype, benefiting from senior experts </br>expertise throughout the flow.
about.description: ChipGlobe GmbH was established at the beginning of 2014 by Volker Frisch, one of the founding members and key executives of frobas GmbH. His vision, along with the collective expertise of a team that had been actively contributing to international semiconductor projects since 2003, laid the foundation for what ChipGlobe is today. Drawing from this extensive background, ChipGlobe was conceived as an independent and highly focused entity, committed to supporting clients across the globe in developing innovative and reliable semiconductor solutions.
about.description2: Specializing in the development of complex chips—including ASICs, FPGAs, and Embedded Systems (Firmware)—ChipGlobe offers comprehensive support that spans the entire product lifecycle. From the early stages of conceptualization and specification through to detailed design, prototyping, and verification, ChipGlobe ensures a seamless path to production. Clients benefit not only from the company’s robust engineering methodologies but also from the hands-on involvement of senior-level experts, who provide critical insights and guidance throughout every stage of the development flow.
about.description3: By combining deep technical knowledge with a collaborative and quality-driven approach, ChipGlobe delivers tailored solutions that align with each customer’s unique requirements, helping them bring their products to market faster and more efficiently.
